attributes.action: Award a posthumous Knighthood to Captain Eric "Winkle" Brown
attributes.additional_details: Captain Brown was and is a true British war hero, a naval aviation legend and a true gentleman.
attributes.background: Eric "Winkle" Brown, who died on the 21st of February was this countries most successful aviator. With the world record for types of aircraft flown, this naval test pilot was the first man to land on a ship, he was personally sent by Chrurchill to retrieve state of the art German aircraft after WW2.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
